allow: Bash(EDITOR="cat > /dev/null && echo ''Migrate packages from Homebrew, in to nix for declarative management, using home manager, pull from hosts/darwin/bobs-laptop'' >" bd edit default-9xm --description)
Bash(bd close default-9xm "Migrated 52 Homebrew packages to Nix/Home Manager. Added programs.gh, programs.k9s, programs.thefuck modules. Freed 1.7GB disk space.")
Bash(bd close default-90m.1 "Extracted SSH keys to hosts/common/keys.nix. Updated all 21 NixOS hosts to use centralized keys.")
Bash(bd close default-90m.1 -r "Extracted SSH keys to hosts/common/keys.nix. Updated all 21 NixOS hosts to use centralized keys.")
Bash(# Check the home-manager session vars file that sets PATH cat /etc/profiles/per-user/bcotton/etc/profile.d/hm-session-vars.sh)

Bash(# Test if the completion script itself produces output/errors
$HOME/.local/bin/bd completion zsh > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo ""bd completion works"" || echo ""bd completion FAILED"")

Bash(# Check the first few lines of bd completion script
$HOME/.local/bin/bd completion zsh)
Bash(# Check if there''s something specific about how zsh-defer runs cat /nix/store/*-zsh-defer-*/share/zsh-defer/zsh-defer.plugin.zsh)

Bash(zsh -i -c '
echo ""=== Function checks ===""
echo ""_bd_get_issues exists: $\(type _bd_get_issues 2>&1 | head -1\)""
echo ""_bd_setup_completion exists: $\(type _bd_setup_completion 2>&1 | head -1\)""
echo ""_bd exists: $\(type _bd 2>&1 | head -1\)""
echo ""_bd_original exists: $\(type _bd_original 2>&1 | head -1\)""
echo ""_bd_with_issues exists: $\(type _bd_with_issues 2>&1 | head -1\)""
echo """"
echo ""=== Testing _bd_get_issues output ===""
_bd_get_issues | head -5
')

Bash(# Test the exact command used in the completion
$HOME/.local/bin/bd list --json --status open,in_progress 2>&1)

Bash(# Check what bd list returns
$HOME/.local/bin/bd list --json 2>&1)

Bash(# Check if --status filter works
$HOME/.local/bin/bd list --json --status open,in_progress 2>&1)

Bash(# Check the correct syntax for --status
$HOME/.local/bin/bd list --help 2>&1)
Bash(# Test the fixed command $HOME/.local/bin/bd list --json --status open | \\ jq -r ''.[] | ""\\\(.id\)\\t\\\(.title | gsub\(""\\n""; "" ""\) | .[0:50]\)""'')

Bash(less" when command ends with --help, -h, or help.

Now typing "git --help" automatically pages the output.
Manual h\(\) function still available for explicit use.
